home.description: TECHWEBSITE, your digital partner in Tournai. We create high-performance websites, innovative designs and custom digital strategies to grow your business.

about.title: About - Our Digital Expertise
about.description: TECHWEBSITE combines creativity and technology to transform your ideas into high-performance digital solutions. Discover our approach and our passionate team.

contact.title: Contact - Let's Talk About Your Project
contact.description: Contact TECHWEBSITE to discuss your digital project. Based in Tournai, we support Belgian and international companies in their digital transformation.

dashboard.description: Explore our analytics dashboard with real-time data, intelligent personalization and insights based on Sitecore Experience Platform.

technologies.subtitle: Technologies We Master
technologies.description: We use the latest technologies to create high-performance, scalable, and secure digital solutions.

response.title: Quick Response
response.description: We are committed to responding to all inquiries within 24 business hours.

terms.pageDescription: Review our terms of service and conditions to understand your rights and obligations when using our services.
terms.introduction: These terms of service govern your access to and use of our services. By using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.subtitle: Your agreement with our terms of service
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement, all applicable laws and regulations, and agree that you are responsible for compliance with any applicable local laws. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

services.title: Description of Services
services.subtitle: What we offer and how it works
services.content: TECHWEBSITE provides web development, design, and digital marketing services. Our services include web and mobile application development, UI/UX design and graphic design, digital marketing and SEO services, and digital transformation consulting. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any or all of our services at any time.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.subtitle: Creating and managing your account
accounts.content: For certain services, you will need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password, for all activities that occur under your account, and for notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use. We reserve the right to refuse service, terminate accounts, or edit content at our sole discretion.

payment.title: Payments and Billing
payment.subtitle: Payment terms and refund policies
payment.content: Payment terms vary depending on the type of service contracted. Specific terms are defined in each service contract.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.content: Our prices are indicated in euros (EUR) and include all applicable taxes unless otherwise stated. Prices may be changed at any time, but ongoing projects retain their initial pricing.

billing.title: Billing
billing.content: Billing is carried out according to the terms agreed in the service contract. Invoices are payable within 30 days unless otherwise agreed.

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.content: Refund requests are considered on a case-by-case basis depending on the nature of the service and project progress. Contact us to discuss your specific situation.

intellectual-property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual-property.subtitle: Copyright and ownership of creations
intellectual-property.content: Unless otherwise stated in the service contract: you retain ownership of your content and trademarks, creations made by TECHWEBSITE are transferred to you once full payment is made, TECHWEBSITE retains the right to use creations for portfolio and promotional purposes. We respect the intellectual property rights of others and expect our clients to do the same.

privacy.title: Data Protection
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your personal information
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of your information in accordance with our privacy policy.

prohibited-uses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited-uses.subtitle: What you cannot do with our services
prohibited-uses.content: You may not use our services for illegal or unauthorized activities, violate intellectual property rights, transmit viruses or malicious code, harass, abuse, or harm other people, or collect personal information without authorization.

termination.title: Termination
termination.subtitle: How and when these terms end
termination.content: These terms remain in effect until terminated by you or us. You may terminate them by ceasing to use our services. We may terminate your access immediately, without notice, for any legitimate reason, including violation of these terms.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.subtitle: Our responsibilities and limitations
liability.content: To the extent permitted by law, TECHWEBSITE shall not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our services. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the services concerned.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.subtitle: How we update these terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be notified to you by email or via our website. Your continued use of our services after changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

governing-law.title: Governing Law
governing-law.subtitle: Applicable jurisdiction and laws
governing-law.content: These terms are governed by Belgian law. Any dispute shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Tournai, Belgium. If any provision of these terms is deemed invalid, the other provisions shall remain in effect.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: How to contact us for legal questions
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of service, you can contact us at legal{'@'}TECHWEBSITE.com or via our contact form.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.description: If you have questions about these terms of service, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team will be happy to help you.

privacy.pageDescription: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal data. Your privacy is our priority.
privacy.introduction: At TECHWEBSITE, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.subtitle: What information we collect and how
collection.content:
We collect information when you visit our website, contact us, or use our services. This includes:

Personal information: name, email address, phone number that you voluntarily provide to us.

Technical data: IP address, browser type, pages visited, visit duration, and other navigation data collected automatically.

Cookies and similar technologies: we use cookies to improve your user experience and analyze our website traffic.

usage.title: Data Usage
usage.subtitle: How we use your personal information
usage.content:
We use your personal data to:

• Provide our services: respond to your requests, manage your projects, and communicate with you
• Improve our website: analyze usage to optimize user experience
• Marketing: send you information about our services (with your consent)
• Legal obligations: comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

We never sell your personal data to third parties.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.subtitle: With whom we share your information
sharing.content:
We only share your personal data in the following cases:

Service providers: we work with trusted partners who help us provide our services (hosting, analytics, email marketing). These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements.

Legal obligations: we may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our legal rights.

Consent: we may share your data with your explicit consent for specific purposes.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies on our website
cookies.content: We use different types of cookies to improve your experience on our website.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to actions you take that constitute a request for services.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve our website's performance. They help us know which pages are most and least popular.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies may be set by our advertising partners. They may be used to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites.

security.title: Data Security
security.subtitle: How we protect your information
security.content:
We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data:

• Encryption: secure data transmission via HTTPS
• Restricted access: only authorized persons have access to your data
• Monitoring: regular monitoring of our security systems
• Training: educating our team on security best practices

However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.subtitle: How long we keep your information
retention.content:
We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:

• Contact data: 3 years after last contact
• Project data: 5 years after project completion for legal reasons
• Navigation data: 13 months for analytics cookies
• Newsletters: until you unsubscribe

After these periods, your data is securely deleted.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.subtitle: What are your rights regarding your personal data
rights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data
• Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
• Right to erasure: request deletion of your data
• Right to restriction: limit the processing of your data
• Right to portability: retrieve your data in a structured format
• Right to object: object to the processing of your data

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy{'@'}TECHWEBSITE.com

children.title: Protection of Minors
children.subtitle: Our policy regarding minors' data
children.content:
Our services are not intended for persons under 16 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from minors. If we discover that a minor has provided us with personal data, we will delete it immediately.

If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal data, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.subtitle: How we inform you of changes
changes.content:
We may modify this privacy policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be notified to you by:

• Email if you are in our contact list
• Notification on our website
• Publication of the new version with the update date

We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about our privacy practices.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: How to contact us for privacy questions
contact.content:
For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your personal data, you can contact us at privacy{'@'}TECHWEBSITE.com or via our contact form.

You can also contact us by mail at:
TECHWEBSITE
Data Protection
Tournai, Belgium

contact.title: Privacy Questions?
contact.description: If you have questions about our privacy policy or your personal data, our team is here to help.
